H0.text: Microevolution is when a species changes in small ways over time.

H1.text: Nanoevolution is the term used to describe a species changing in small ways over time.

H2.text: Minievolution is when a species changes in small ways over time.

H3.text: Small evolution is the process by which a species changes in small ways over time.

A4.text: Scientific organizations such as the American Association for the Advancement of Science describe microevolution as small scale change within species,

A5.text: Typically, observable instances of evolution are examples of microevolution; for example, bacterial strains that have antibiotic resistance.
